remarks: Define the set of Cauchy filter bases on a uniform space.  A Cauchy filter base is a filter base on the set such that for every entourage ` v ` , there is an element ` a ` of the filter "small enough in ` v ` " i.e. such that every pair ` { x , y } ` of points in ` a ` is related by ` v ` ".  Definition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  II.13. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)
statement:
df-cfilu $p |- CauFilU = ( u e. U. ran UnifOn |-> { f e. ( fBas ` dom U. u ) | A. v e. u E. a e. f ( a X. a ) C_ v } ) $.
$d a f u v $.
